title: ChatGPT-Enhanced Programming Problem-Solving Workshop: Strengthening Technical Text Analysis and Logical Expression

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts (variables, conditionals, loops) and experience with Python or JavaScript, ability to analyze technical texts, grammatical structures, and specialized terminology
context.additional_context: A practice-centered course where professionals acquire programming skills necessary for task automation, solving diagnostic problems through collaboration with ChatGPT. Emphasis is placed on interpreting code error messages, technical writing, logical expression, and the use of specialized terminology.

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to resolve code errors with ≥80% accuracy through ChatGPT interaction and enhance technical text interpretation skills.
Correct logical errors in generated code within ≤3 debugging attempts and document the problem-solving process using structured language.
Improve technical report writing and specialized terminology communication skills based on ChatGPT interaction records (console messages, feedback).

resources: VS Code or Jupyter Notebook Installation Guide

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
